title: Book of the dead

properties.value: The book of the dead is an equippable book obtained as a reward from completing A Kingdom Divided. Having it equipped or in the player's inventory is required when casting resurrection spells.

Book of the dead

Item ID25818

The book of the dead is an equippable book obtained as a reward from completing A Kingdom Divided. Having it equipped or in the player's inventory is required when casting resurrection spells.

As it is an improved version of Kharedst's memoirs, the book is able to teleport to the same locations as the memoirs, and holds up to 60 teleport charges compared to the memoirs' 40.

If lost, the book of the dead can be reclaimed from Commander Fullore, who is located on the ground floor of the Kourend Castle.

Contents

  • 1 Recharging
  • 2 Teleportation
  • 3 Changes
 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0+6+0
 Defence bonuses
+0+0+0+0+0
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+3List

Recharging[edit | edit source]

In order to recharge the book, players must inspect the Old Memorial north of Land's End.

Location of the Old Memorial.

Players can reach the memorial via the following:

  • Teleporting to the Kourend Woodland via Rada's blessing, arriving just south-east of it.
  • Teleporting to Xeric's Lookout via Xeric's talisman, arriving north-east of it.
  • Teleporting to Shayzien via Book of the dead (History and hearsay), arriving north-west of it.
  • Taking a ship to Land's End by talking to Veos at Port Piscarilius or Port Sarim, arriving south of it.

Each charge costs 1 law, body, mind, and soul rune (319 per charge), granting the player 10 Magic experience per charge added. The maximum amount of charges the book can hold is 60.

Teleportation[edit | edit source]

Players cannot teleport past level 20 Wilderness.

Icon Torn page Teleport location

The left-click option for the book of the dead is now "Wield" instead of "Reminisce".

[[File:Book of the dead detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''book of the dead''' is an equippable book obtained as a reward from completing [[A Kingdom Divided]]. Having it equipped or in the player's inventory is required when casting [[resurrection spells]].

As it is an improved version of [[Kharedst's memoirs]], the book is able to teleport to the same locations as the memoirs, and holds up to 60 teleport charges compared to the memoirs' 40.

If lost, the book of the dead can be reclaimed from [[Commander Fullore]], who is located on the ground floor of the [[Kourend Castle]].
{{ToC}}
{{Infobox Bonuses

}}

==Recharging==
In order to recharge the book, players must inspect the [[Old Memorial]] north of [[Land's End]].
{{Map|name=Old Memorial|1520,3478|align=right|height=250|width=250|r=2|mtype=square|caption=Location of the Old Memorial.}}
Players can reach the memorial via the following:
* Teleporting to the [[Kourend Woodland]] via [[Rada's blessing]], arriving just south-east of it.
* Teleporting to [[Xeric's Lookout]] via [[Xeric's talisman]], arriving north-east of it.
* Teleporting to [[Shayzien]] via Book of the dead ([[History and hearsay]]), arriving north-west of it.
* Taking a ship to [[Land's End]] by talking to [[Veos]] at [[Port Piscarilius]] or [[Port Sarim]], arriving south of it.

Each charge costs 1 [[law rune|law]], [[body rune|body]], [[mind rune|mind]], and [[soul rune]] ({{Coins|{{GEP|Law rune}}+{{GEP|Body rune}}+{{GEP|Mind rune}}+{{GEP|Soul rune}}}} per charge), granting the player 10 [[Magic]] [[experience]] per charge added. The maximum amount of charges the book can hold is 60.
{{Clear}}
==Teleportation==
Players cannot teleport past level 20 [[Wilderness]].
